data.description: Summarize the structure of an HTML file
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The proposed module provides access to high level information about
    the structure of an HTML document i.e. names and # of tags, size of
    the document, MD5, name and size of any images, link validation. I
    use this module to analyze if and how HTML documents I parse have
    changed over time.

    Thanks Jay Powers
